dao.name: SEL_PLACE_COD
dao.statement: SELECT BQPLACE_RF.PLACE_COD, BQPLACE_RF.PLACE_NAM, BQPLACE_RF.PLACE_ENG, BQPLACE_RF.RSPT_COD, BQPLACE_RF.DESK_QNT, nvl(BQPLACEMERGE_RF.PLACE_COD ,BQPLACE_RF.PLACE_COD) parent_cod FROM BQPLACE_RF, BQPLACEMERGE_RF WHERE ( bqplace_rf.place_cod = bqplacemerge_rf.merge_cod (+))

dao.name: QRY_PLACE_COD
dao.statement: select place_cod, place_nam from bqplace_rf where trim(place_cod) = trim(:place_cod)
